AWARDS

DADABHAI NAOROJI AWARDS

  1. DADABHAI NAOROJI INTERNATIONAL AWARD

  2. DADABHAI NAOROJI MILLENIUM AWARD

DR. S.S Mohapatra quote :-

“Dr. Shyam Sundar Mohapatra former member of parliament(Loksabha and Rajyasabha) and secretary general of Dadabhai Naoroji International Society Giving a clarion call to the Nation to be prepared to face challenges. He said Dadabhai naoroji Millennium award has become a coveted prize for those who have rendered life time service to the nation in any field.”
IIC,NEW DELHI(2002)

HOUSE OF LORD (UK) MEMBER LORD SWARAJ PAUL RECEIVING DADABHAI NAOROJI INTERNATIONAL AWARD
